title: Senior Third Party Security Manager
description_html:
Senior Third Party Security Manager
Division: CISO
About the Role: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Third Party Security Manager to join the IT Risk tribe. In this role, you will be responsible for internal coordination of Third Party Security assessments for all external Third Parties including Merger and Acquisition initiatives and enable the post-merger integration initiatives when applicable. 
Key responsibilities:
Merge and Acquisition Assurance: 
•	Assessment and Due Diligence execution on future mergers and acquisitions
•	Consulting and support in definition of security road up for potential start ups
•	Prepare detailed reports on findings and Security recommendations
Third-Party Assurance Lifecycle (Due Diligence, Contract Management, Exit, Ongoing monitoring)

raw_payload.Title: Senior Third Party Security Manager

title: Security Operations Center Tier 2 Analyst
location_text: Poland | Belgium | France | Netherlands | United Kingdom
description_html:
Candidates in this role will respond to events or conduct incident response operations according to documented procedures and industry’s best practices. Candidates in this role must have excellent communication skills. 
Candidates will be required to participate in multiple intelligence communities and be able to disseminate pertinent information throughout the SOC.  
Ideal candidates should have extensive experience in Linux and/or Windows operating systems as well as multiple security areas such as SIEM, IDS, EDR, and WAF while having a deep knowledge of networking and attack methods. Must display enthusiasm and interest in Information Security.

raw_payload.Title: Security Operations Center Tier 2 Analyst

Candidates in this role will respond to events or conduct incident response operations according to documented procedures and industry’s best practices. Candidates in this role must have excellent communication skills. 
Candidates will be required to participate in multiple intelligence communities and be able to disseminate pertinent information throughout the SOC.  
Ideal candidates should have extensive experience in Linux and/or Windows operating systems as well as multiple security areas such as SIEM, IDS, EDR, and WAF while having a deep knowledge of networking and attack methods. Must display enthusiasm and interest in Information Security.

title: EB Operations Administrative Support
description_html: The EB Transversal Services APAC team position itself as a leader by triggering or supporting change locally, we act as a bridge between APAC offices and the rest of the group in the spirit of OneEuroclear and we inspire local talents by providing them the right level of support and tools. The Global Support Team is responsible to provide direct support on entry-level tasks to Operational teams across the group. We process various administrative duties, Reporting, KPI’s and other centralised operational activities for the Operational Teams within Euroclear Bank. We are looking for an ambitious junior talent with a strong desire to grow and learn in a caring environment and a long term career vision. Our operations team is consistently growing. As the perfect entry point into Euroclear Bank, this is a great opportunity for the right candidate to develop within our business while improving his knowledge and soft skills.

title: Sales and Relationship Manager
description_html:
We are hiring a Sales & Relationship Manager for our Tokyo-based Japan team. As a core market in Asia, Japan is central to our client base and business growth.
Join our international team and contribute to shape the next generation of commercial success. In this role, you will meet with clients to educate them about our services and encourage additional usage, while also identifying new business opportunities and potential clients.
